mn55:6.1_0: Idha, jīvaka, bhikkhu aññataraṁ gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharati.
mn55:6.2_0: So mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
mn55:6.2_4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
mn55:6.3_0: Tamenaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimanteti.
mn55:6.5_0: So tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassa gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamati;
mn55:6.6_0: Tamenaṁ so gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā paṇītena piṇḍapātena parivisati.
mn55:6.8_0: ‘sādhu vata māyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā paṇītena piṇḍapātena pariviseyyāti.
mn55:6.9_0: Aho vata māyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā āyatimpi evarūpena paṇītena piṇḍapātena pariviseyyā’ti—
mn55:6.11_0: So taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ agathito amucchito anajjhopanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati.
mn55:6.13_0: api nu so bhikkhu tasmiṁ samaye attabyābādhāya vā ceteti,
mn55:6.15_0: “Nanu so, jīvaka, bhikkhu tasmiṁ samaye anavajjaṁyeva āhāraṁ āhāretī”ti?

mn55:7.7_0: Sace kho te, jīvaka, idaṁ sandhāya bhāsitaṁ anujānāmi te etan”ti.

mn55:12.3_0: ‘gacchatha, amukaṁ nāma pāṇaṁ ānethā’ti, iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena bahuṁ apuññaṁ pasavati.

mn55:12.7_0: Yampi so pāṇo ārabhiyamāno dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti,
mn55:12.7_1: iminā catutthena ṭhānena bahuṁ apuññaṁ pasavati.
mn55:12.8_0: Yampi so tathāgataṁ vā tathāgatasāvakaṁ vā akappiyena āsādeti,

mn55:13.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, jīvako komārabhacco bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn55:13.3_0: Kappiyaṁ vata, bhante, bhikkhū āhāraṁ āhārenti;
mn55:13.4_0: anavajjaṁ vata, bhante, bhikkhū āhāraṁ āhārenti.
mn55:13.6_0: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
